title: Accordion ML Glossary
description: An accordion-style glossary of Machine Learning terms. Each term expands to show its definition when clicked.

terms.definition: A type of ML where the model learns from labeled data.
A type of ML where the model finds patterns in unlabeled data.
A type of ML that uses neural networks with multiple layers.
A type of ML where an agent learns by interacting with an environment and receiving rewards.

functionality.accordionBehavior: Clicking a term toggles its definition panel open or closed.
